properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USERNO , USERID , USERPWD , USERNAME , GENDER , AGE , EAMIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , HOBBY , ENROLLDATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_USERNO.NEXTVAL , 'XXX' , 'XXX' , 'XXX' , 'X' , XX , 'XXXXXX' , 'XXXXX' , 'XXXXXXXXXXXX' , 'XXX,XXX' , SYSDATE )
SELECT USERNO , USERID , USERPWD , USERNAME , GENDER , AGE , EAMIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , HOBBY , ENROLLDATE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY AGE

SELECT USERNO , USERID , USERPWD , USERNAME , GENDER , AGE , EAMIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , HOBBY , ENROLLDATE
FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = '"
SELECT USERNO , USERID , USERPWD , USERNAME , GENDER , AGE , EAMIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , HOBBY , ENROLLDATE from member where username LIKE '%
UPDATE MEMBER SET USERPWD , EAMIL , PHONE , ADDRESS WHERE USERID =
